title: Warning alerts v3: Add backend API endpoint to fetch alert details (score + drivers + interventions)

sections.text: Implement a versioned `/alerts/v3` read API that returns the composed alert payload (risk score output, ranked drivers, and recommended interventions) for a given account/opportunity, behind the existing feature flag. Define and enforce a stable response schema with pagination/filtering (risk type, score/confidence, top drivers w/ evidence, interventions w/ rationale) and consistent null/missing-field handling across Salesforce/HubSpot. Add integration tests to ensure deterministic ordering and schema compatibility for downstream UI rendering.
